title: Train fault causing delays on the East West Line

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #PasirRis and #TanahMerah have resumed. Free regular bus services have ended.
[EWL] UPDATE: Fault cleared, train services are progressively being restored. Free regular bus services are still available between #TanahMerah and #PasirRis.
[EWL] UPDATE: Free regular bus svcs btwn #TanahMerah and #PasirRis. Our station staff will assist.
[EWL]: Due to a train fault, pls add 20mins train travel time btwn #PasirRis and #TanahMerah.
